thread.title: Andrew Grech to sell his Kew mansion within weeks of Slater and Gordon results
thread.title_full: Andrew Grech to sell his Kew mansion within weeks of Slater and Gordon results | afr.com

author: Will Glasgow
title: Andrew Grech to sell his Kew mansion within weeks of Slater and Gordon results
text:
Slater and Gordon managing director Andrew Grech is selling his Kew mansion in a hurry. Louie Douvis by Will Glasgow First an update on Slater and Gordon managing director Andrew Grech 's mansion in the lovely Melbourne suburb of Kew .
It seems Grech is not dithering around with this. We're told the expressions of interest campaign to sell the " Masterpiece of Victorian Grandeur " ends on September 9 â€“ that is, in three weeks, two weeks after the listed law firm releases its financial results (after a four-day delay to better accommodate Greg Medcraft 's ASIC).
The five-bedroom stunner which sits on 1800 square metres of Paul Bangay -landscaped gardens is expected to sell for north of $10 million. Family reasons are the stated cause for the sale, according to the property's agent.
The listing follows a notable shrinkage of Grech's fortune. He shelled out about $11 million for Slater and Gordon shares earlier in the year when they were trading north of $6. Shares in the firm closed on Monday at $3.14.
